definition: (Internet slang) to post a photo of oneself online
to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before
(Internet slang) flattering photo (pun on 照片[zhao4 pian4])/photoshopped picture
to seek new friends through personal ads, dating apps etc
to reply to an invitation/(Internet) to post a comment on a forum topic
to keep sb company for a chat/(esp.) to be a paid escort
(slang) alternative for 哎呦[ai1 you1] "oh my!"
phonetic a, similar to 呵/-azine, see 吖嗪[a1 qin2]
dark reddish purple/Internet slang abbr. for 這樣子|这样子[zhe4 yang4 zi5]
auntie, youngest of sisters in mother's family
negative score/minus (in grades, such as A-)
